舒.definition: to stretch; to unfold; to relax; leisurely

舒一口氣.definition: to heave a sigh of relief

舒喘靈.definition: albuterol, kind of chemical used in treating asthma

舒城.definition: Shucheng, a county in Lu'an 六安[Lu4an1], Anhui

舒城縣.definition: Shucheng, a county in Lu'an 六安[Lu4an1], Anhui

舒壓.definition: variant of 紓壓|纾压[shu1 ya1]

舒夢蘭.definition: Shu Menglan (1759-1835), Qin dynasty writer, poet and editor of Anthology of ci poems tunes 白香詞譜|白香词谱

舒展.definition: to roll out; to extend; to smooth out; to unfold

舒慶春.definition: Shu Qingchun (1899-1966), the real name of author Lao She 老舍[Lao3 She3]

舒氣.definition: to heave a sigh of relief; to get one's breath back; to vent one's spleen

舒眠.definition: to sleep well; to get restful sleep; (medicine) to be anesthetized

舒眠鍵.definition: sleep mode button (on the remote control of an air conditioner)

舒緩.definition: to ease (tension); to relax; to cause sth to relax; to alleviate; relaxed; easy and unhurried; leisurely; soothing; mild (slope)

舒蘭.definition: Shulan, county-level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province

舒蘭市.definition: Shulan, county-level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province

舒適音.definition: comfortable voice (well within one's range of pitch)

舒馬赫.definition: Michael Schumacher (1969-), former German racing driver
